import sys
input=sys.stdin
testcast=input.read()
petrapan=testcast.split()
testfragments=map(int, petrapan)
counter=0
i=0
tests=testfragments[i]
i=i+1
candycede=0
candyone=candycede
for counter in range(tests):
	candyone=0
	n=testfragments[i]
	i=i+1
	c=testfragments[i]
	i=i+1
	for candyn in range(n):
		candyone=candyone+testfragments[i]
		i=i+1
	if candyone<=c:
		print('Yes')
	else:
		print('No')
